Cookie jar as a candle holder: You can use the cookie jar as a candle holder by placing a tea light candle inside.
Cookie jar as a holder for small items: You can use the cookie jar as a holder for small items like pens, paper clips, and other office supplies.
Cookie jar as a night light: You can use the cookie jar as a night light by placing a small light bulb inside.
Cookie jar as a vase: You can use the cookie jar as a vase for fresh flowers.
Cookie jar as a pencil holder: You can use the cookie jar as a pencil holder by placing pencils inside.
